text: Ragnhild Queseth Haarstad (4 April 1939 - 6 June 2017) was a Norwegian politician for the Centre Party. She was born in Grue, Norway. She was Minister of Local Government and Regional Development (Norway) from 1997 through 1999. Haarstad died on 6 June 2017 in Oslo, Norway at the age of 78.Ragnhild Queseth Haarstad er d√∏d ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Norwegian politicians
